scripts.demo: cd examples/react/ && yarn install && npm run start
scripts.test:setup: yarn install && npm run install:examples && npm run link && npm run build
scripts.dev:setup: yarn install && npm run install:examples && npm run link
scripts.build: npm run clean:build && npm run tsc:cjs && npm run tsc:esm
scripts.tsc:cjs: cd vite-plugin-ssr/ && tsc --outDir dist/cjs/ --module CommonJS --target ES2017
scripts.tsc:watch:cjs: cd vite-plugin-ssr/ && tsc --outDir dist/cjs/ --incremental --watch --module CommonJS --target ES2017
scripts.release:test-pre-release: npm run clean:all && yarn install && npm run install:examples && npm run link && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.release:test-post-release: npm run clean:all && yarn install && npm run install:examples && npm run test
